title: Clapperboard (studio of Mirka Mora)
brief_description: Clapperboard made from wood and painted black and white, board has cloth tape around middle and bottom sections. Back of board has a piece of paper attached with rows of numbers.
description: Clapperboard made from wood and painted black and white, board has cloth tape around middle and bottom sections. Back of board has a piece of paper attached with rows of numbers.
